A4.text: In 2012, she was diagnosed with myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS), a disease of the bone marrow.

A5.text: In 2007, Roberts was diagnosed with an early form of breast cancer.

A6.text: Leukemia is a group of blood cancers that usually begin in the bone marrow.

A7.text: Acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) is a cancer of the lymphoid line of blood cells characterized by the development of large numbers of immature lymphocytes.
